nameEntry.part: ISMAPNG Archives - Institute Centre in Stanmore, New South Wales
Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Stanmore

biogHist.abstract: ISMAPNG Archives - Institute Centre in Stanmore, New South Wales is one of the locations where the ISMAPNG Archives are managed. It holds the records of institutions formerly run by the Sisters of Mercy Goulburn and Bathurst Congregations.
biogHist.p: Application for access to records held by the Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives must be made, in writing, to the Archivist, providing personal identification documents to establish the right to access information. Physical access to the records is not permitted due to their fragility and the need to protect the confidentiality of information concerning other persons. Information will be forwarded by mail.

descriptiveNote.p: Any records related to children in out-of-home care held by Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository were transferred to the ISMAPNG Archives - Institute Centre in Stanmore, New South Wales by 21 March 2016.
